messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Just a rant
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/13/03 9:51:26 AM, livnrway@filertel.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/13/03 9:51:26 AM, livnrway@... writes:

<< Has anyone else been sent this site on an email?? Who thinks up this
stuff anyway?! This and the ads on the radio for the videos that teach
manners.....geez - when will people get it that if they just live and love with their
kids these things are not a problem! >>

I read through it. Seems aimed more at people with foster kids or already
troubled kids.

It occurs to me that some of the STERLING and really wonderful advice we
share here amongst ourselves would just be an irritation in a family in which
things have gotten SO screwed up that the kids can think of nothing much but
revenge or running away. And in such places, if a kid is placed in a home and
that's the last stop before reform school or the street, it MIGHT be that
behavior modification is their very best hope of living together without violence
(in word and thought, if not all out).

Sandra

messages.subject: Just a rant
messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone else been sent this site on an email??  Who thinks up this stuff anyway?!  This and the ads on the radio for the videos that teach manners.....geez
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone else been sent this site on an email?? Who thinks up this stuff anyway?! This and the ads on the radio for the videos that teach manners.....geez - when will people get it that if they just live and love with their kids these things are not a problem!
Jinger


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
